name: Add a new concept
function_list: add_new_concept(image_id: str, classname: str, old_classname: str) -> dict
description: Replace an old class with a new class in the image.
example_questions: No, this is not a [new class name]. This is a [old class name].
no this is a [new class name] not a [old class name]

tools: add_new_concept(image_id: str, classname: str, old_classname: str) -> dict
action_list.content: Generate the code to replace the old class with the new class in the image.
Execute the code to replace the old class with the new class in the image.
From the results, ask the user if the new class is correct. If not, ask for the correct class name.
